en.title: localhost:2025
en.intro:
localhost:2025 is an evening dedicated to exploring the intersection of art, design, and emerging technologies. Organized by METAA (Media Experiments in Technology and Art Association), this public event aims to celebrate innovative practices and foster meaningful discussions about the role of technology in shaping our contemporary world. 
This year, we bring together emerging talents, renowned practitioners, and engaged audiences for an inspiring program featuring award-winning projects, thought-provoking talks, and immersive performances. Join us as we highlight groundbreaking work from the next generation of creators while reflecting on the critical implications of digital culture.

blocks.markdown:
## An Immersive Evening of Digital Arts, Technology, and Emerging Creativity

Organized by the METAA (Media Experiments in Technology and Art Association), localhost:2025 is a public event celebrating experimental artistic practices connected to emerging technologies. 

This unique evening showcases emerging talents from the Swiss digital scene while exploring the social, ecological, and political impacts of contemporary technologies.

entries.alt: A portrait of Vera van de Seyp
entries.more: Vera works with generative design, typography, and AI. She has collaborated with WIRED, Serpentine Galleries, and others, creating interactive and experimental work. A former MIT Future Sketches researcher, she teaches and empowers creatives to develop their own tools.
entries.title: Keynote (EN)
METAA Prize Winner (ECAL)
entries.alt: A person touching a holographic screen
entries.description: An AI avatar that critiques the commodification of feminine appearances in digital interfaces

entries.alt: A person in a dark room looking at a computer screen with a video projection on the wall behind him
entries.title: METAA Prize Winner (HEAD)
entries.description: An immersive game exploring resource management through intricate storytelling and world-building

slots.event:
Vera van de Seyp
Keynote Speech

blocks.markdown:
### METAA is a non-profit Swiss association dedicated to promoting experimental artistic and digital practices. It supports emerging creators by highlighting projects that address issues related to technology.

Since 2020, the Release Candidate Award has recognized the most daring graduation projects from the Media & Interaction Design (ECAL) and Media Design (HEAD) programs. This award provides the winners with professional exposure during an annual private event , a key gathering for the METAA community. With localhost:2025 , the association expands this celebration to the public, sharing these critical insights and emerging talents with a broader audience.
Made possible with the support of the State of Vaud and our other partners
Made possible with the support of the State of Vaud and our other partners
